title: Whens next ool split
body: One for rioters out there. Website hasn't been updated so i simply want to ask when the next split is?

replies.body:
It hasn't been announced yet but assuming it's similar to the way it was organised this year, the first split of 2017 could be somewhere at the start of February.

Unless things drastically change in the meantime, you can check this year's announcement post for a rough idea.

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/esports/vAdzwJp2-the-2016-oceanic-open-ladder-is-here
Well going to bump the post. Would be nice to know when next split is.
